answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I have found some cities and counties that have used the Managing for Results program from Weidner.  You may want to contact them directly for more information about their experiences with the program and the group.
Gunnison County, CO
http://www.gunnisoncounty.org/administration_mfr.html
Maricopa County, AZ
http://www.maricopa.gov/mfr/pdf/SuccessStories-Maricopa-County.pdf
Chula Vista, CA- Police Department
http://www.chulavistaca.gov/City_Services/Public_Safety/Police_Department/PDFs/StrategicPlan.pdf
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Pamela Muse
text:
Arvada, CO is interested in implementing Managing for Results with Weidner and have a couple questions:
Have you ever used Weidner?
Did you implement Managing for Results w/Weidner?
What’s your overall impression of Weidner?
Whatever help/support you can provide is appreciated!
Pamela G Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Implementing Managing for Results w/Weidner
